betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Cloth§r is used for crafting §6Bismuth Armor§r, §6Casual Armor§r, and the Molotov cocktail (The §6Kyiv Special§r).

Right-clicking on a rag will give you a §6Piss-Soaked Rag§r, but if you have accumulated more than 500 RAD, you'll receive a §6Blood-Soaked Rag§r. There's no information on the use of the blood-soaked rag.

Holding a rag and right-clicking on water, or simply throwing it in water, will yield a §6Damp Cloth§r.

§2Wet and Piss-Soaked rags can be dried in the furnace.

A Piss-Soaked Rag is better than a Damp Cloth §m(Urine is power, water is bower)§2.

A rag soaked in urine can be used to create hydrazine.
